mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted from user where user_id = #{userId}

select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted from file-share.user limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select user_id, user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted from user where user_name = #{username}
mapper.insert: insert into file-share.user(user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted) values (#{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPwd}, #{userSalt}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userQq}, #{userSex}, #{userBirthday}, #{userImg}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime}, #{deletetime}, #{isDeleted})

insert into file-share.user(user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.userNickname}, #{entity.userPwd}, #{entity.userSalt}, #{entity.userPhone}, #{entity.userEmail}, #{entity.userQq}, #{entity.userSex}, #{entity.userBirthday}, #{entity.userImg}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

insert into file-share.user(user_name, user_nickname, user_pwd, user_salt, user_phone, user_email, user_QQ, user_sex, user_birthday, user_img, createTime, updateTime, deleteTime, is_deleted) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.userNickname}, #{entity.userPwd}, #{entity.userSalt}, #{entity.userPhone}, #{entity.userEmail}, #{entity.userQq}, #{entity.userSex}, #{entity.userBirthday}, #{entity.userImg}, #{entity.createtime}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.isDeleted})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , user_nickname = values(user_nickname) , user_pwd = values(user_pwd) , user_salt = values(user_salt) , user_phone = values(user_phone) , user_email = values(user_email) , user_QQ = values(user_QQ) , user_sex = values(user_sex) , user_birthday = values(user_birthday) , user_img = values(user_img) , createTime = values(createTime) , updateTime = values(updateTime) , deleteTime = values(deleteTime) , is_deleted = values(is_deleted)
mapper.update:
update file-share.user
user_name = #{userName},
user_nickname = #{userNickname},
user_pwd = #{userPwd},
user_salt = #{userSalt},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
user_email = #{userEmail},
user_QQ = #{userQq},
user_sex = #{userSex},
user_birthday = #{userBirthday},
user_img = #{userImg},
createTime = #{createtime},
updateTime = #{updatetime},
deleteTime = #{deletetime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
where user_id = #{userId}
